invocations.description: This function is deprecated! Use topuseitem, topuseonitem, topmoveitem or toplookitem instead. Returns the data structure of the tile's top item at position x:posx, y:posy, z:posz. You can access its id or count by appending the .id or .count properties. Any information accessing on the item datastructure must be performed right away or stored elsewhere because a call to wait() or any script event may invalidate it.
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
if topitem($posx, $posy, $posz).id == 3031 then
	moveitems(3031, '0-15', 'ground')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will move any gold coin found under you to an empty slot on your opened containers.
